features: WAKE UP WITH GLOWING SKIN: This nourishing night cream works overnight to restore and soothe skin so you can get your beauty sleep and wake up with a dewy, radiant, and totally restored complexion
DECADENT NIGHT CREAM: This revitalizing night cream features a decadent, luxurious cream formula with naturally hydrating ingredients to nourish, soothe and soften skin
ULTRA-HYDRATING FORMULA: Infused with Jojoba Oil to lock in moisture, Cucumber Extract to calm skin and reduce puffiness, and Shea Butter to deeply hydrate, nourish and soften skin

RESTORES COMPLEXION OVERNIGHT: Works overnight to replenish lost moisture and soothe skin without that greasy feel. In the evening, massage the luxe formula to your face and neck to reap all the skin-loving benefits
SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan
body.description: Get your beauty sleep—and wake up with a dewy, radiant, and totally restored complexion. This nourishing night cream is enriched with naturally hydrating ingredients like Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter, and Cucumber Extract to replenish lost moisture and soothe skin without that greasy feel. In the evening, massage the luxe formula to your face and neck to reap all the skin-loving benefits. Great for: Normal, combination, and dry skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Poreless Putty Primer 16HR Camo Concealer Holy Hydration! Face Cream - Fragrance Free Lip Lacquer Why We Love This: The ultimate skin perfecting face primer that grips makeup for all-day wear & a flawless finish. A crease-proof liquid concealer that provides 16-hour full coverage with a matte finish. A lightweight moisturizer that nourishes & plumps skin while delivering lasting hydration. A vitamin-enriched lip gloss that brings on a sheer wash of color & high-octane shine. Key Ingredients: Squalane Avocado Oil, Kaolin Clay Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Peptides, Squalane, Vitamin B5 Vitamin A, Vitamin E

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow this stuff is fantastic! And cheap!
reviews.reviewText: I have really dry skin so I need an ultra deep moisturizer at night so that I wake up with plump skin in the morning. Not many moisturizers keep my skin hydrated over night. My makeup is patchy in the morning if I use the wrong moisturizer… but this stuff? It’s amazing. I put it on when I get out of the shower at night (you also don’t need much because it’s rich and thick!) and it instantly sinks into my skin but at the same time stays on my skin ALL NIGHT and keeps my face super moisturized. Before using this product, I was getting super frustrated waking up in the morning to do my foundation and dealing with cakey patches or my makeup separating because my face was a little too dry. But not anymore!!!! This hydrates my skin so nicely and I wake up looking refreshed, hydrated and plumped. And the price is just wonderful, so I will keep buying this over and over to use as my nightly moisturizer! It has also not irritated my skin or caused me to break out. It’s a holy grail product for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer! I have oily and dry skin and this works very well for my skin type. It’s light and applies well. It helps my skin to feel moisturized and healthy. I also really like that it’s not fragrant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband uses this every day. It is light weight and moisturizing. This is non-greasy and no sent. My husband has tried a few others and he prefers this one over anything else. Which the price point is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice silky feeling just wish it smelled better. It doesn’t smell bad necessarily just doesn’t smell good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this every night and makes my face smooth when I wake up it’s a great product and value for the money no strong odor and I would say good for sensitive skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Newbie to ELF products AND moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Im 49 and never put much effort into skincare. But i love watching instagram an utube videos of people who do an mentally beat myself up over my skin. My 2024 new years resolution was to stop that an love myself more so i came to Amazon to hunt for products. Its overwhelming!! Im good with cleansers masks an scrubs an specifically was looking for moisturizer and a retinol serum. I chose this ELF moisturizer because of its high reviews , small size and low price point. Sux wasting money on things that stink or are oily or make me break out. Firstly i love the container. Its cute an i like how it feels. Silly i know but ive stopped using products over the years cuz of sucky annoying packaging LOL im hoping they offer larger sizes to save money. I mite even squirt it into this container if so. Next...smell...im super sensitive to certain scents . like i can smell ear wax if someones ears are dirty YUK! LOL I am happy to report i can smell NOTHING. Just like when i had covid lol. It sinks right in nicely too an my face feels baby soft!! I think im not used to having hydrated skin cuz i keep sweating an feel heated....could be a hot flash tho lol ANYWAYS its not greasy. No residue. An love how smooth my skin is. Im excited to try ELF out for my next forray into a skin care regime!! A++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars happy with purchase
reviews.reviewText: glad i decided to give this a try. great for the price! & other moisturizers I've tried leave my face itchy or more oily in the morning. this gives my skin the perfect amount of hydration, leaves my face feeling soft and clean as well. plan on buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and does the job
reviews.reviewText: Love elf products and this one is no different. Great for sensitive skin, cannot beat the price point for a good moisturizer. Sometimes I apply a think layer of aquaphor over this moisturizer at night for double hydration.
Skin care. Bought it because of the price and it’s all natural ingredients and it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Turned my sandpaper-like dry skin from perimenopausal husk to smooth and plump. Recommend!

Llevo casi dos meses usándola y me gusta mucho. Deja la piel muy suave y nada grasosa. Al despertar por la mañana se ve radiante y humectada.Tiene una consistencia suave y un aroma muy, muy ligero. Muy recomendable.

I've been using the elf skin care for 2 weeks now, I just added this & its actually amazing. Affordable & makes your face so smooth, silky & hydrated. The only thing I was a little upset about is the packaging is different than the picture. I think the picture may be the old packaging. Other than that I love it! Get yourself some elf skin care asap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love this moisturiser non perfumed and great for sensitive skin
